name: Purple Champagne
description: Purple Champagne is a sativa-dominant cannabis strain bred by Grand Daddy Purp, who crossed a rare sativa phenotype of his famous Granddaddy Purple with Pink Champagne (AKA Phantom). The main appeal of Purple Champagne is her vibrant bud coloration, but sativa lovers will also appreciate the heady, mood-lifting effects this strain has to offer.Â
attributes_title: Uplifted, Focused, Creative, Euphoric, Happy, Stress, Fatigue, Pain, Depression, Headaches, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy
